welcome.success: Hi, I'm Birder, your Twitter Assistant which allows you to publish new tweets and to browse global trends.

card.content: Use Twitter with your voice. Powered by Alexa.

postTweet.error: Now I can't post your tweet. Please, try again later.

getTrends.error: Now I can't retrieve World trends. Please, try again later.

help.message: If you want to post a tweet, you can say <break strength='medium'/> post <break strength='weak'/> and what you would like to publish. You can find the Notice of Non-Affiliation and Disclaimer in the Skill description.

card.content: How to use Twitter For Alexa.

stop.message: Thanks for using Twitter For Alexa, see you next time!

card.content: Thanks for using Twitter For Alexa.

errors.noAuth: You didn't linked your Twitter account to Alexa. Please open your Alexa App to set it up.

miscellaneous.v1: Ops, there has been a problem with your request. Retry!
